The vote by Western Kentucky University: s Student Government Association to give black students "full and free access" to the college.
The confirmation by the university that: 3. The report by the American Bacon website stating that the university would grant free tuition to black students as an apology for slavery.
The statement by Brian Anderson: one of the authors of the resolution, that the motion was primarily intended to be symbolic and not expected to result in free tuition for black students.
